name: Rammus
title: the Armordillo
shortBio: Idolized by many, dismissed by some, mystifying to all, the curious being Rammus is an enigma. Protected by a spiked shell, he inspires increasingly disparate theories on his origin wherever he goes—from demigod, to sacred oracle, to a mere beast transformed by magic. Whatever the truth may be, Rammus keeps his own counsel and stops for no one as he roams the Shuriman desert.

skins.name: Molten Rammus
skins.description: An unstoppable warbeast drummed up from the Infernal hordes, Rammus simply chooses a direction and begins spinning—through homes, armies, and nations alike, burning everything to ashes.

skins.name: Full Metal Rammus
skins.description: Those who make it to the Full Metal Robot Fighting League—the premier institution for gear-crunching, robot-on-robot violence—must often face off against the fearsome Full Metal Rammus. It is an initial rite of passage, faced by every contender-bot, that leaves entire arenas in tremors...

skins.name: Guardian of the Sands Rammus
skins.description: Rammus, the skewering wheel—ancient guardian of the sands, we invoke thee to protect us from an evil of our own making. Let no man tread upon these hallowed grounds, lest they be broken beneath your unforgiving carapace.

skins.name: Hextech Rammus
skins.description: Even the most renowned Hextech artificer must bow to the creativity and perfection of nature. After crafting each of Rammus's arcs to mimic the golden spiral, the creature proved so efficient at rolling... it escaped the moment its creator put down her wrench.

skins.name: Astronaut Rammus

chromas.name: Astronaut Rammus

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

skins.description: Rammus was supposed to be the Space Program's core asset for terraforming new planets, and he was—until his digging unearthed a purple surprise no one was ready for. Now he has become something wholly different, his power turned to nefarious ends at the hands of the evil invader-meeps.

skins.name: Durian Defender Rammus

chromas.name: Durian Defender Rammus

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

skins.description: Rammus roams the land in a pungent peel, and though he may look adorable, he gives new meaning to the phrase “silent but deadly.” Some say the effluvial enigma's armor reeks of sewage and sweaty socks, but strong-willed warriors know how sweet he can really be—if you can get past the smell.

passive.name: Spiked Shell
passive.description: Rammus gains bonus Attack Damage scaling with his Armor and Magic Resistance.

spells.name: Powerball
spells.description: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Rammus curls into a ball, gaining @MinimumMoveSpeed@ Move Speed, accelerating up to @MaximumMoveSpeed@ Move Speed over @RollDuration@ seconds. Rammus stops after colliding with an enemy, dealing @PowerBallDamage@ magic damage, Knocking Back, and Slowing nearby enemies by @SlowPercent@% for @SlowDuration@ second.

Recast: Rammus ends this Ability early.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Defensive Ball Curl
spells.description: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, and returning damage to enemies that attack him.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Rammus enters a defensive formation for @BuffDuration@ seconds, gaining @BonusArmorTooltip@ Armor and @BonusMRTooltip@ Magic Resist and dealing @ReturnDamageCalc@ magic damage to enemies that Attack him.

Recast: Rammus ends this Ability early.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Frenzying Taunt
spells.description: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him.
spells.dynamicDescription: Rammus <status>Taunts</status> an enemy champion or monster for @Duration@ seconds. Monsters are dealt <magicDamage>@MonsterDamageCalc@ magic damage</magicDamage>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Soaring Slam
spells.description: Rammus hops into the air and slams down at a target area, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If cast while Rammus is in Powerball, Rammus knocks up enemies near the center as well.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Rammus hops into the air and slams down in an area, dealing @InitialDamageCalc@ magic damage and Slowing by @SlowAmount*100@% for @SlowDuration@ seconds. If used during Powerball, enemies in the center take an additional @spell.PowerBall:PowerBallDamage@ magic damage and are Knocked Up for @KnockupDuration@ seconds.

Rammus then creates @NumberOfPulses@ aftershocks in the area over @BuffDuration@ seconds, repeating the Slow.

The range of this Ability is increased by Rammus's Move Speed.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
